revised_title: Experiments on the Radiometer and the Influence of Radiation on Moving Bodies
tldr: The author conducted experiments with a radiometer, a device that demonstrates the pressure of light through the movement of its vanes. They discovered that the movement of the vanes is influenced by both the radiation from candles and the presence of a magnet. The author also discussed the internal friction within the radiometer and its impact on the movement. These findings contribute to the understanding of the relationship between light and motion.
